TemplateContents.Body:
Dear ##Employee##,


We would like to inform you that your recent request has been processed by the HR department.




We are pleased to inform you that your request has been approved.


Details below:


Request Type: ##RequestType##

Date: ##RequestDate##

Approval Date: ##ApprovalDate##



Should you have any further questions or require additional assistance, feel free to reach out.




Regards,


HR department
